sense.def: Combined Designation of all Pathological Condition resulting from a demon’s curse. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry can tui 蠶退 quotes Bai yi fang General reference to books includ- 百一方 ing the Tang era Zhou hou bai yi fang 肘後百一方, and the Song era Bai yi xian : 若或悲泣呻吟者 , 此為邪祟。以蠶紙作灰 , 酒水任下 , 差 , “If someone weeps with grief and moans, this is an evil curse . Burn paper with silkworm eggs to ashes, and ingest with wine and water. This will banish [the curse]”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhu tong qi 諸銅器 quotes Dong tian qing lu Miscellaneous contents. Song era, 洞天清錄 between 1237 and 1252. : 山精水魅多歷年代 , 故能為邪祟。三 代鐘鼎彝器 , 歷年又過之 , 所以能辟祟也 , “Mountain spirits and water seduction-specters have existed for ages. Hence they are able to issue an evil curse . Funeral objects such as bells and vessels from the three Ancient Dynasties have an even longer history. Hence they are able to remove such curses”.
